entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump #usavirus #COVID19 Hey, to all guys out of China, as a Chinese I hope all of you can go on living so that we could talk about democracy and freedom of speech later, or reflect on the one-sided report you made to China. Now we have to defeat COVID-19 together,Stay strong World! https://t.co/2I1D4yAHfE
